name: dotliquid
description: Guidance for DotLiquid template engine for .NET. USE FOR: safe user-generated templates, email templates, CMS content rendering, sandboxed template execution, report generation from data models. DO NOT USE FOR: Razor-based server-side views (use ASP.NET Razor), logic-heavy templates requiring full C# (use Scriban or Razor), compiled template performance-critical paths.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
